text: hey everyone I have an exciting update
to share with you and if you're on my
newsletter mailing list you already know
what I am talking about so I've been
sharing Thai food with you on hot Thai
Kitchen for the past five years and
believe it or not I have over 200 videos
dedicated to Thai cooking so lately an
interesting thing has been happening and
that is I've been receiving requests for
dishes that are not Thai I thought that
was really cool I love to see that
people are wanting that but I had no
place to share it with you because the
show is called hot Thai kitchen so it
would have been a little strange for me
to start sharing you know ribs and
cornbread with you so to take care of
that I'm gonna start a second show and
it's simply going to be called pice
kitchen and it will include all things
yummy and delicious that are outside the
scope of Thai cooking even though I grew
up cooking Thai food I grew up eating
Thai food it is at the very core of my
being I enjoy cooking all sorts of
different types of cuisine and that's
probably the case for you as well I mean
we all love variety in life right when I
first started cooking my cooking career
I didn't start with Thai food when I
went to culinary school that what that
wasn't Thai food either
so I've accumulated all these delicious
recipes over the years and finally I'm
so excited to be able to share them on
my youtube channel with you guys before
you panic hot Thai kitchen isn't going
anywhere it's still gonna be going
strong but instead of me strictly
sharing only Thai food with you I'm
gonna get to share with you all the
other dishes that I also know and love
here's what pice kitchens all about
first of all it's still gonna be on the
same youtube channel so you don't have
to go anywhere else for that but to make
it easier for you to find i'll curate a
separate playlist of just spice kitchen
videos so you can go straight there for
them and as far as content goes I'm
thinking okay I'm open I'm open to
suggestions but I'm thinking right now
it's mostly going to be cooking videos
very much like the ones on hot Thai
Kitchen
we're still gonna film it here Adam
still gonna be filming it but in
addition to cooking videos I also want
to share with you other things so I'm
thinking some product discoveries so
we'll talk about cool food items we'll
talk about cool kitchen tools and this
opens the door for me to bring on guest
chefs experts so I've talked to my
friend Hana who you may recognize she
was my co-host on the TV show one world
kitchen
Japanese chef extraordinaire she has
agreed to come on and share with us some
of her Japanese cooking secrets so I can
do things like that with you and that
means that pice kitchen is now
officially open for requests so if you
have dishes that you love and you want
to see my version of it please send me
the requests or if you have ideas of
other sort of non cooking type food
videos send them along as well so you
can leave your ideas right here in the
comments or you can get in touch with me
through my website or Facebook or
Twitter so many different ways to get a
hold of me and if you haven't signed up
for the newsletter please do so up with
a link right there and you can keep
yourself updated with news such as this
and I will see you next time
